title: I AM JUST SAD THAT NO ONE LOVES FIORA LIKE I DO...
body:
I really miss my old Fiora.

If you felt she needed to be changed in the 1st place means to me that you just didn't love her.

I love her. 

I wish the developers loved Fiora like I do.

replies.body: Fiora was too much like Yi, her ult was basically a slightly stronger version of alpha strike which meant there was no real logic to the kit. Fiora longs for a worthy opponent, so if you're not having to put effort into smashing lane Fiora isn't happy.
